entries.title: Adjustable Screen Brightness
entries.content: You can now set your preferred Normal and Dim brightness levels in the Settings page.

entries.title: Improved Dimming Behavior
entries.content: The app now restores brightness more smoothly after inactivity.

entries.title: Screen Dimming
entries.content: To help prevent screen burn-in during long sessions, the app now includes automatic screen dimming. After one minute of inactivity, the screen will gently dim and return to normal brightness once activity is detected.

entries.title: Pause Timer
entries.content: You can now pause your focus sessions anytime. The timer will automatically pause if you leave the app, and you can resume your session by pressing Play when you return.

entries.title: New Cycles Indicator
entries.content: The previous indicator seems to confuse some users into thinking it's a swipeable element.It's been replaced with rings to represent the cycle.A normal pomodoro technique applies 4 workâ€“break cycles. That explains the 4 cycles in the application.

entries.title: Experimental Functions
entries.content:
Good news for closed testing users.
The 25 minute for closed testing proved to be unnecessarily long.
To solve this issue, I am introducing an experimental section in the **Settings Page**.
Enable it to switch the Timer Duration from *minutes* to *seconds*.

entries.title: Apply Button
entries.content: Simple but necessary, the timer now only stops and changes its values in the main page onlyif the user presses the apply button. No more losing track of current focus progress if you clickon the time in the Settings Page.

entries.title: Released Closed Testing ver.0.1.0
entries.content:
Initial testing phase deployed to limited users.
Collecting feedback on usability and performance.
